entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #55523
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55522
  • Blazor Bug in LONG data type #55521
  • Add a Blazor Cache component #55520
  • Blazor.webassembly.js - Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #55518
  • Multiple @page breaks css isolation in .net 8.0 blazor #55517
  • Checkbox input tag helper throws FormatException: 1 is not a valid value for Boolean #55512
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #55510

Closed

  • IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature.Timestamp is empty #55334
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55509
  • Route Recognition of method with input type #55431
  • `endpoints.MapControllers().WithMetadata(new ApiExplorerSettingsAttribute { GroupName })` doesn't work #54087
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #55492
  • CreatedResult does not set StatusCode #55483
    9.0-preview5
  • Burstable capacity? #55289
  • [QUIC] `QuicConnectionContext.Abort` calls connection shutdown with error code -1 #55196

PullRequests

Created

  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `2954cb8` #55514
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add internal pipeline to test IdentityModel nightlies #55504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • Fix IdentityModel pipeline #55527
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Enable trimming for OpenAPI package #55465
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55501
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55502
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.31
  • 1es-ify IdentityModel test pipeline #55505
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix generating XML doc comments for query parameters in gRPC JSON transcoding #55482
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview5
  • Set status code on CreatedResult types #55494
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview5
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • removing pure comment #55496
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
